item.title: Newest tag
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

[quote=“javis, post:32, topic:186024”]Exe i swear your mentally retarded. Like i said the render does go with the effects you would just have to have seen the show to know this. I have explained that part a few times and i thought you would have figured this out by now. Honestly your oppinion means nothing to me but the shear fact that you where incorrect in what you said was the only reason i commented. You think just because i disagree with what you said makes me wrong and it doesnt. You are just stuck up because you think you know everything about graphics. I can see where you say that the effects are over powering on the left and then leed in to negative space on the right. I will say this one more time in hopes that you will understand what I’m saying to you: I DID IT BECAUSE IT MATCHES THE OVERALL EFFECT I WAS GOING FOR.

I take critism well and actually improve from what i learn maybe you should take notes

Now after you read this GTFO my thred[/quote]how 2 fail 101 presented by javis.

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:33, topic:186024”]Exe is an asshole, end of story. Just ignore all of his posts, that’s the best you can do…[/quote]chris flatters exe

item.title: Newest tag
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

[quote=“javis, post:25, topic:186024”]how bout you take the dam tampon out of your ass and quit being a stuck up bitch. Just because i thought your C&C blowed doesnt mean i dont take other peoples. What I was saying is that you criticue was incorrect because you dont understand the look i was going for. Its called difference of taste. I have actually improve my self drematically from learning off of what people have told me and if you new anything about what my graphic was supposed to be you wouldnt be so blind as to say the effects dont fit. They fit perfectally.[/quote]This post is funny. Exe loves e-drama. You’re still doing exactly what I said you were awhile ago. You think if anybody speaks down to this ugly shit, they’re instantly wrong. I don’t need to know anything about graphical design to tell you this thing is ugly. The only real reason you think what I’ve said is incorrect is because after hearing the other incompetent rednecks of the forum say “u r gud @ gfx”, you believe any negative is wrong.

The ignorance in your post is also irritating. “They fit perfectly”. How? Tell me how they fit? All the effects push down and to the right, then on the right side of the image, it’s completly calm. The render is hardly doing what the effects are attempting. Just look at the render, it’s suggesting what’s in the picture is pulling up or pushing down, nothing is suggesting a bipolar background.

The render is also still overly contrasted. The choppy-ness from so much color changing has completly ruined that render. Now look at the bottom, it’s blurry. Why is that the only blurry piece of the image, when everything else is pushed further away? What about the text? It’s almost invisible. It’s hidden in the corner. It draws from the image as much as the render dose. Look at the sword, it sticks out like a sore thumb. It just doesn’t fit there.

Now, shut the fuck up.

Read full topic

item.title: Newest tag
item.dc:creator: @OmidSan OmidSan
item.description:
@OmidSan wrote:

nator123123:

Well, I like men.

Men Men Men, Mennnnnnnnnnn. (Two and a Half Men) Lol

[quote=“javis, post:25, topic:186024”][quote author=exe626 link=topic=248407.msg2089456#msg2089456 date=1204713004]

[quote author=javis link=topic=248407.msg2088380#msg2088380 date=1204684318]
saying the effects dont fit with the render, its to random, and left side effects make no sense kind of says you dont know what i was going for. [/quote]Even if I had not idea of what you’re attempting, I say nothing fits, so nothing fits. Simple concept.

[quote author=javis link=topic=248407.msg2088380#msg2088380 date=1204684318]
The effects do fit with the render if you have ever seen the show/read the book you would know that the characters have spiratual pressure which creates the clipping masks effect i added. The flamming and fire to the left all plays along into the over all effect i was going for. [/quote]If the effects fit with the render, I wouldn’t have said they didn’t. I never said it wasn’t like the character, the current render DOESN’T work with the damned effects. Everything else you’ve said is pointless blasphemy.

Saying its to random actually made me lol when i first read it. Honestly how could it ever be to random its art.
[/quote]Art is more than likely random. You, sir, are an ignorant son of a bitch, and you don’t like criticism that talks down to your ugly shit. You’re the average “GFX DESIGNER” of the internet, thinking everything you do is professional, and whoever speaks down to it is wrong.

how bout you take the dam tampon out of your ass and quit being a stuck up bitch. Just because i thought your C&C blowed doesnt mean i dont take other peoples. What I was saying is that you criticue was incorrect because you dont understand the look i was going for. Its called difference of taste. I have actually improve my self drematically from learning off of what people have told me and if you new anything about what my graphic was supposed to be you wouldnt be so blind as to say the effects dont fit. They fit perfectally.[/quote]

Yeah, actually they do fit perfectly into place…Maybe the 2nd girl is all I see that could have a few tweaks to her image to make the whole Image a little better.

But overall it’s pretty nice…

Read full topic

how bout you take the dam tampon out of your ass and quit being a stuck up bitch. Just because i thought your C&C blowed doesnt mean i dont take other peoples. What I was saying is that you criticue was incorrect because you dont understand the look i was going for. Its called difference of taste.
